title: Unity Software stock rises on report of possible China spinoff
text:
Shares fell in early July after Unity said it offered to buy IronSource Ltd. for $4.4 billion, following a large decline in May, when the company revealed a workaround to Apple Inc.'s AAPL opt-out of using Identifier for Advertisers inadvertently sabotaged its own ad-targeting tools. Unity shares are down 61% over the past 12 months, compared with a 6% decline in the S&P 500 index SPX.

Unity Software stock rises on report of possible China spinoff
